dcterms:description: The IST-EURECOM Light Field Face Database (LFFD) consists of LF face images captured by a Lytro ILLUM camera, including 4000 LF images from 100 subjects, with variations in emotions, actions, poses, illuminations, and occlusions.
dcterms:title: IST-EURECOM Light Field Face Database (LFFD)
